headline: Giuliani Sought Help for Client in Meeting With Ukrainian Official Last Year
abstract: As he discussed the possibility of a White House meeting for Ukraine’s president, President Trump’s lawyer asked to save the Kyiv mayor’s job.
lead_paragraph: KYIV, Ukraine — When Rudolph W. Giuliani met with a top aide to Ukraine’s president last summer, he discussed the prospect of a coveted White House meeting for the president while seeking Ukraine’s commitment to certain investigations that could benefit President Trump politically.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates
United States Defense and Military Forces
